item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (692 points | 184 comments)
2. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (22 points | 1 comment)
3. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (264 points | 100 comments)
4. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (392 points | 384 comments)
5. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (78 points | 61 comments)
6. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (93 points | 23 comments)
7. VVVVVV Source Code (67 points | 10 comments)
8. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (58 points | 28 comments)
9. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (11 points | discuss)
10. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (46 points | 22 comments)
11. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (73 points | 9 comments)
12. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (295 points | 247 comments)
13. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (36 points | 7 comments)
14. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (98 points | 54 comments)
15. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (150 points | 72 comments)
16. Sutton and Barto book implementation (35 points | 9 comments)
17. Continue (YC S23) is hiring software engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
18. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (500 points | 470 comments)
19. EPA Plans to Shut Down the Energy Star Program (36 points | 17 comments)
20. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (59 points | 12 comments)
21. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (183 points | 95 comments)
22. Creativity came to pass (21 points | 7 comments)
23. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (214 points | 72 comments)
24. Inside an architect's underground home in Mexico City [video] (11 points | 1 comment)
25. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (73 points | 27 comments)
26. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (89 points | 42 comments)
27. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (78 points | 74 comments)
28. Reverse-engineering Fujitsu M7MU RELC hardware compression (19 points | 1 comment)
29. iOS Kindle app now has a ‘get book’ button after changes to App Store rules (140 points | 138 comments)
30. Will supercapacitors come to AI's rescue? (35 points | 49 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
